there is small subtitle sync prob..

In VLC 

right click - interface - track syncronisation - advancement of subtitle over video [+] 
49  -  50 seconds

as per your need..

In KMplayer

right click - subtitles - r subtitle resync - esync subtitle - 49500 ms

will solve subtitle prob... rest are fine...enjoy..
